full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 3 rd - copy To Whom It May Concern: I, Yu Q. Mahr, 52 years old, United States citizen, American Army WW-2 veteran, and holds Certificate of Naturalization No. 8410208, dated March 19, 1962, issued to me at the U. S. District Court, New York, New York. That I am engaged in the Chinese laundry business at 100 W. Jersey Street, Elizabeth, N. J. My family and I reside at the same address. That I wish to state that MAR Doo aka MAR Gong Doo who formerly lives at apartment 11, #69 Mott St., New York, N. Y. and whose present address is #32 Oxford st., Boston, Massachusetts, and I are fellow clansman and that we are of the same village of Lung Shing Village, Toyshan District, Kwangtung, China; and that we have known each other since our days in our home village in China. That I know of my own knowledge that MAR Gong Doo aka MAR Doo is a man of excellent moral character. That during MAR Gong Doo's residence in New York City I visits with him in New York at least two Sundays of each month. yu Q. mahr Yu Q. Mahr City of Elizabeth County of Union State of New Jersey Subscribed and sworn to, before me, this 25th day of March 1966 Notary Public Chessere My commission expires 11/15/67
